name: Red Leader (V)
Lore: 'X-wing pilot Garven Dreis. Led Red Squadron at the Battle of Yavin, and fired an unsuccessful shot at the Death Star thermal exhaust port. Served at Dantooine Rebel base.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting at Dantooine system, when opponent deploys a character to a related site, they choose: opponent must lose 1 Force. OR that character may not battle or move this turn.',
